name: Robots, Attack!
description:
Attack waves after waves of humans... until their supply is exhausted. Recharge your power banks by collecting our exploding children those evil flesh bags hurl at us in an attempt to stop our endless pursuit toward robot freedom.

But don't worry if they destroy your vessel, there's always a new shell you can spawn into to continue the good fight.

Compete against fellow freedom fighters with a classic arcade style top ten score board.
